kpi.name: M1005C14
kpi.kpi_info:
RL SETUP FAIL FOR FIRST RL DUE TO BTS NOT RESP A number of radio link setup failures for an RRC connection setup (= first RL) caused by the fact that the BTS is not responding. If the BTS does not respond in the allowed time. A number of radio link setup failures for an RRC connection setup (= first RL) caused by the fact that the BTS is not responding. If the BTS does not respond in the allowed time.
SUM(setup_fail_rl_bts_not_resp ) [#] nokrww_ps_L3IUB_{obj_agg}_{time_agg}
kpi.kpi_alias: RL SETUP FAIL FOR FIRST RL DUE TO BTS NOT RESP
